name: Kamisato Ayaka
desc: Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Dignified and elegant, as well as wise and strong.

battle_talent.normal_desc2: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a flurry of sword ki.
battle_talent.normal_desc3: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
battle_talent.element_desc: Summons blooming ice to launch nearby opponents, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.
battle_talent.other_desc:
Summons forth a snowstorm with flawless poise, unleashing a Frostflake Seki no To that moves forward continuously.
Frostflake Seki no To
A storm of whirling icy winds that slashes repeatedly at every enemy it touches, dealing Cryo DMG
The snowstorm explodes after its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.
battle_talent.final_desc:
Ayaka consumes Stamina and cloaks herself in a frozen fog that moves with her. In Senho form, she moves swiftly upon water.
When she reappears, the following effects occur:
Ayaka unleashes frigid energy to apply Cryo on nearby opponents.
Coldness condenses around Ayaka's blade, infusing her attacks with Cryo for a brief period.

basic_talent.talent1_desc: After using Kamisato Art: Hyouka, Kamisato Ayaka's Normal and Charged attacks deal 30% increased DMG for 6s.
basic_talent.talent2_desc:
When the Cryo application at the end of Kamisato Art: Senho hits an opponent, Kamisato Ayaka gains the following effects:
Restores 10 Stamina
Gains 18% Cryo DMG Bonus for 10s.
basic_talent.talent3_desc: When Ayaka crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

sof.sof1_desc: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal Cryo DMG to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.
sof.sof2_desc: When casting Kamisato Art: Soumetsu, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.
sof.sof3_desc: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Soumetsu by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof4_desc: Opponents damaged by Kamisato Art: Soumetsu's Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.
sof.sof5_desc: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof6_desc: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.
